name: gSheet Realtime Proxy
description: A simple-as-possible Node server that pushes data from a Google Sheet in almost real time.

GSHEET_URL.description: The public sharing URL of the Google Sheet containing your data.

REFRESH_INTERVAL.description: How frequently the server checks the Google Sheet for updates, in milliseconds. The default is 30000 (30 seconds). Probably don't go lower to avoid spamming Google's servers.
